item.title: Roatán Travel Guide (Bay Islands/Caribbean Honduras/Honduras/Central America/North America)
item.description: Roatán is a stunning island in Bay Islands, Honduras, perfect for outdoor enthusiasts and cultural travelers alike. This guide covers everything you need to know to plan a visit, including top places to visit, hiking and biking routes, outdoor adventures, cultural attractions, local food and drink, where to stay, and nearby excursions.
